survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Book Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with subscription-based book delivery services, focusing on delivery experience, book selection, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of books available in your subscription plan?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of books available in your subscription plan?

questions.question_text: How frequently do you receive books that match your reading preferences?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the response options are clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How frequently do you receive books that match your reading preferences?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your subscription service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple options to gauge feature prioritization.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your subscription service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the condition of the books upon delivery?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-ended follow-up for additional feedback.

script.question_text: How would you rate the condition of the books upon delivery?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the subscription service?
